entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 29. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy this evening with 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 29. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 29. Wind chill near minus 39. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 24 December 2022
